channel.title: Matrix 718 Voting
channel.description:
So I want to create matrix 718 voting. I don't know where to start all I have is a mysql database set up. How do I got about setting up the server sided and website sided things?
All I have is this - Demolitionx.webatu.com/vote it stores the player who voted and the reward they chose. How do I make it so you can co ::claim in game and get the reward you chose?
